idea:
The 9th Soul is an initiative that focuses on inner work. We are on a mission to help people transform their lives by making use of our Holistic Life Coaching, Business Coaching, Numerology, Tarot and Six Sensory skills.


Our offerings include Consulting and Learning services:

- Life and business coaching

- Numerology consultation

- Tarot consultation

- Six sensory consultation

- Learn Numerology

- Learn Tarot 


Our journey started in December 2019. Last 18 months of The 9th Soul marks:

- 300+ consults across services

- 500+ engagements through masterclasses

- 70+ professional numerologists mentored and certified

- 2 lacs+ donated towards various causes
name: The 9th Soul

idea: A startup company who believes in providing an environment friendly and 90% biodegradable alternative which is as effective as n95 face masks . Our masks are made out of natural fabric like orange peel, aloe Vera and banana fibre fabric , they are also naturally dyed and provide 4 layer protection. The top layer being the natural fabric , middle two layers of polypropylene antiviral fabric and last layer of natural fabric again . India being the world’s highest populated country who is using plastic masks and these masks are then dumped in landfills causing harm to our motherland , we want to provide a better solution for this and protect from future harm
name: Maintenance.by.s

idea:
DigitalDawai is a Healthtech company working towards improving & strengthening the Nation’s Healthcare Infrastructure by providing local Pharmacies and Doctors a digital platform to connect with patients effortlessly.

We want to build an eco-system where all independent pharmacies and doctors can go digital and improve patients health outcomes by enhancing medication process through digital technology that is convenient & affordable.
name: DigitalDawai Services Private Limited

idea: Orangutan (company name Aspira Diagnostics Private Limited) is a multi-faceted organization operating with three verticals- esports, talent management, and apparel & merchandising- under its wing. We aim to have successful teams competing to win tournaments and championships and creating niche gaming content. We will work together to create, produce and promote content across different avenues. In addition to this, we will also be launching our own apparel and merchandising line.
name: ASPIRA DIAGNOSTICS PRIVATE LIMITED
